newsitem.title: ROMANIA: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.
newsitem.headline: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.

text.p: * Romania counts on support from the United States, but also from the other NATO member-countries to get a quick admission into the defence alliance, foreign ministry spokesman Sorin Ducaru told a news conference.
* Ducaru said Romania started bilateral talks with NATO officials in Brussles on the country's integration.

* Romanian and Ukrainian foreign ministry experts are due to meet in Kiev on October 26 for discussions on boosting bilateral ties and preparing to resuming negotiations on a frienship treaty, Ducaru said.
* Romania opened centre for promoting privatisation and investments in Tel Aviv.
* Romania will attend meeting of European Union trade ministers on the single internal market project, held in Luxembourg, on October 25, Sorin Ducaru said. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
